short_summary: Installation of new boilers at Fredericton Research and Development Centre
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement for the supply and installation of new condensing boilers, located at the Fredericton Research and Development Centre, 850 Lincoln Road, York County, New Brunswick. The work under this project consists of furnishing all plant, labour, equipment and material to perform the work. Within 16 weeks of Award Notification.
